sentences.en: Acute brain swelling in the closed cranial cavity is serious.
sentences.cn: 封闭的颅腔内急性脑肿胀是非常危险的.

sentences.en: Compression of nerve roots cranial to L 4 is uncommon.
sentences.cn: 压迫腰4神经根相对少见.

sentences.en: Conclusion Cranial MRI contributed to early stage diagnosis of virus encephalitis.
sentences.cn: 结论头颅MRI有助于病毒性脑炎的早期诊断.

sentences.en: Cranial Autonomic Symptoms in Migraine : Characteristics and Comparison with Cluster Headache.
sentences.cn: 偏头痛与丛集性头痛自主神经症状不同.

sentences.en: Cranial nerve tutorial. Fundamental information about the cranial nerves.
sentences.cn: 大脑神经指南.脑神经的基本资讯.

sentences.en: Fig . 4 . Normal cranial ultrasound through the frontal lobes term infant.
sentences.cn: 图4正常婴儿的经额叶冠状切面.

sentences.en: Fig. 9. Normal cranial ultrasound through the lateral ventricles term infant.
sentences.cn: 图9. 正常婴儿经侧脑室体的颅脑超声切面.

sentences.en: Five of the twelve cranial nerves become activated when you kiss somebody.
sentences.cn: 当你吻某人时十二条脑神经中五条将变得活跃.

sentences.en: However, the tiger has bigger cranial volume than the lion.
sentences.cn: 然而, 老虎比狮子具有更大的颅容量.

sentences.en: Methods: The location of bony "window" and mastoid foramen were studied , and the distance from bony "window" to cerebellopontine angle was measured on 18 dry and 12 wet cranial bones.
sentences.cn: 方法：采用干性颅骨18具，福尔马林固定的头颅标本12具分别进行骨窗及乳突孔的定位测量和桥小脑角结构距骨窗的距离测定。

sentences.en: Most arachnoid cysts are supratentorial, in the middle cranial fossa.
sentences.cn: 大多蛛网膜囊肿是位于幕上 、 中颅窝内.

sentences.en: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of anterior cranial fossa fracture.
sentences.cn: 目的讨论前颅窝骨折的诊断和治疗.

sentences.en: Purpose To improve the diagnostic accuracy for middle cranial fossa hematoma.
sentences.cn: 目的:提高颅中窝血肿诊断准确性.

sentences.en: The absence of the fetal cranial vault anencephaly is shown here.
sentences.cn: 无脑儿显示胎儿颅穹窿缺陷.

sentences.en: To analyze the MRI findings and characteristics the cranial nerve tumors.
sentences.cn: 探讨脑神经肿瘤的MRI表现及特征.

sentences.en: To evaluate CT and MRI for the diagnosis of cranial extradural empyema.
sentences.cn: 目的评估MR和CT对颅内硬膜外积脓的诊断价值.

trans.tran_en: Cranial means relating to your cranium
